sentence: A campaign staffer for former NFL star Herschel Walker, who is running as a Republican for a Senate seat in Georgia, posted a photo with Clarence Thomas on Friday afternoon marking the first time Thomas has been seen since being released from a hospital on March 25 following an undisclosed illness.
author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Clarence Thomas publicly spotted for first time since being hospitalized

sentence: The paper decided to go through the Instagram account of Senate candidate Herschel Walker, and they have found a number of accounts that were followed thatuh, well, I guess the reporters did not likeit seems?
author: Brad Slager
title: CNN 'Conspiracy Buster' Raves When the Network Hires a Conspiracy Source
